title: HP OmniBook X Laptop, Snapdragon® X Elite X1E-78-100,14inch(35.6 cm),2.2K Touch Display,IPS,16GB LPDDR5x,1TB SSD,Next Gen Windows, Copilot +,Blue,1.34 kg,14-fe0121QU
features: 【Qualcomm integrated SoC】Full-size, backlit, soft grey keyboard; Qualcomm FastConnect 7800 Wi-Fi 7 (2x2) High Band Simultaneous (HBS) and Bluetooth 5.4 wireless card, 1 USB Type-A 10Gbps signaling rate (HP Sleep and Charge); 1 headphone/microphone combo; 1 USB Type-C 10Gbps signaling rate (USB Power Delivery, DisplayPort 1.4a, HP Sleep and Charge); 1 USB Type-C
【Snapdragon X Elite X1E-78-100】Elevate your display experience with Qualcomm integrated SoC. Whether for work or entertainment, enjoy captivating visuals that redefine your computing journey.

【Upgraded memory and storage】Enjoy swift multitasking with 16GB LPDDR5x-8448 MT/s, ensuring efficient application handling. The 1TB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD provides ample storage for a seamless work experience.

【Micro-edge display】Delight in intricate details on the 14inch, 2.2K touch display, anti-glare, and Corning Gorilla Glass NBT,. Along with 300 nits, it offers stunning clarity, enhancing your viewing experience.
【Long battery life】Power up to 50% in just 45 mins with HP Fast Charge. The 3-cell, 59Wh battery sustains productivity, reducing the need for frequent charging.
